hero.title: Transform YouTube Videos into Smart Mind Maps
hero.subtitle: Just paste a YouTube link, and our AI assistant will automatically extract key content, generating structured mind maps to help you quickly understand and organize video knowledge.
hero.noCard: No credit card required, free to use basic features upon registration

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: MindTube provides powerful features to help you quickly digest and organize video content, improving learning efficiency and knowledge absorption.
features.autoSubtitlesDesc: The system automatically extracts complete subtitles from YouTube videos, supporting multiple languages without manual input or copying and pasting.
features.aiSummaryDesc: Using advanced natural language processing technology to intelligently analyze video content, extract key points and generate structured outlines.
features.interactiveMindmapDesc: Convert AI-generated outlines into visual mind maps, supporting expand, collapse, zoom and other interactive features to help you understand content hierarchy.
features.exportFormatsDesc: Support exporting mind maps as Markdown, PNG, SVG and other formats for easy saving, sharing and use in other note systems.
features.historyManagementDesc: Automatically save all processed videos and their mind maps for easy viewing and revisiting at any time, no need to process the same video repeatedly.
features.customParamsDesc: Adjust the AI summary's level of detail, focus points and style to meet the needs of different learners and different types of content.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: MindTube's process is simple and intuitive. In just three steps, you can convert lengthy videos into clear mind maps.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Copy the YouTube video link you want to convert to a mind map and paste it into the system input box.
howItWorks.step2Desc: The system automatically extracts subtitles, uses AI to analyze content, extract key points and generate structured summaries.
howItWorks.step3Desc: View the generated interactive mind map, freely expand, collapse, zoom, or export it in your desired format.

cta.title: Start Converting Your YouTube Videos into Mind Maps
cta.subtitle: Sign up for free and start experiencing AI-assisted video summarization and mind map generation.
cta.freeUsage: No credit card required, free to use 5 times per month

demos.title: See MindTube in Action
demos.subtitle: Check out these real-world examples of AI-generated mindmaps from YouTube videos
demos.example1Title: AI at DeepMind, Google's Intelligence Lab
demos.example1Desc: This mindmap breaks down the key concepts from a 60 Minutes feature on DeepMind, showing AI advancements and future applications.
demos.example2Title: NVIDIA GTC 2025 - Jensen Huang on AI's Future
demos.example2Desc: This mindmap visualizes key points from Jensen Huang's GTC 2025 keynote on AI infrastructure and NVIDIA's vision for computing.

mindmap.title: Title
mindmap.pasteYoutubeLink: Paste the YouTube video link you want to analyze, and we'll automatically extract the subtitles and generate a mind map.
mindmap.apiKeyMissing: You haven't set up your Gemini API key. Please go to
mindmap.toSetApiKey: to set up your API key first in order to generate mind maps.
mindmap.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
mindmap.noMindmapsDesc: You haven't created any mind maps yet. Click 'Create Mind Map' to start creating.
mindmap.tryDifferentSearch: Try different search terms or adjust your search criteria.
mindmap.errorCreatingMindmap: There was an error regenerating the mind map
mindmap.shareSuccess: Mind map shared to public library
mindmap.unshareSuccess: Mind map removed from public library
mindmap.regeneratingDesc: The mindmap is being regenerated with improved timestamps. This may take a minute.
mindmap.regeneratedDesc: The mindmap has been updated with improved timestamps. You can now click on nodes to seek to specific parts of the video.
mindmap.regeneratingTimeout: The mindmap is still being regenerated. Please refresh the page in a few minutes to see updates.
mindmap.quotaError: API quota exceeded. Please try again later or update your API key in settings.
mindmap.noPublicMindmapsDesc: There are no public mind maps available. Create and share your own mind maps to contribute to the community.

deleteAccount.confirmMessage: All your account data will be {{strongStart}}permanently deleted.{{strongEnd}} If you are sure, please click {{strongStart}}"Confirm"{{strongEnd}} to proceed. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.success: Your account has been successfully deleted

settings.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all your data.

userInformation.title: User Information
userInformation.geminiApiKeyHelp: Your personal Gemini API key for generating mindmaps.
userInformation.preferredGeminiModelHelp: Select your preferred Gemini model for mindmap generation. This will override the default model.
